about_the_game:
Join Arin and Vera, two siblings being hunted for carrying an unspeakable secret, as they start a perilous journey across the continent to the shining city of Sunspire - their only hope of salvation. Take control of a memorable cast of characters and help them fight for their lives in this classic-style fantasy RPG adventure that you won't soon forget.

The demo of Eternal Remnant: The First Chapter includes the first segment of play from the full release, and takes about 1 - 2 hours to complete.



"I just need you to trust me."



  • Enjoy a narrative-driven experience that is in equal parts heartwarming as it is breathtaking, all in the space of 4 -6 hours

  • Fast and breezy combat with characters teaming up to unleash dazzling combo attacks

  • A visually stunning adventure with a mix of blended environments and pixel art

  • A world ripe for exploring, packed with treasure and a variety of fearsome foes

Eternal Remnant: The First Chapter is a fluid experience from beginning to end, one which keeps the story moving and the gameplay evolving throughout your journey, and will leave you wanting more.

Conquer the past. Fight against darkness. Find your destiny.

name: Eternal Remnant: The First Chapter Demo
short_description: Dive into the unforgettable tale of two siblings on the run in this emotional RPG journey. With only their wits and a cursed power too dangerous to control, they must fight, explore and scavenge to survive in an unfamiliar world. Will their bond be strong enough to endure the road ahead?
